responses.rationale: The segment describes a past case and symptoms, not speculation about future relief.
The segment describes the nature of the virus and a negative assessment, not speculation about future relief.
The segment expresses a current feeling about a topic, not speculation about future relief from a problem.
The segment describes past/current negative impacts, not speculation about future relief.
The segment describes past/current negative impacts, not speculation about future relief.
The segment describes a current risk factor, not speculation about future relief.
The segment predicts a future negative event ('expect food prices... to surge'), not future relief or improvement.
The segment contains an explicit calming cue ('risk... remains low'), which disqualifies it from the Q10 pattern.
The segment describes symptoms/impacts, not speculation about future relief.
